traceability.evidence: Specification 008.0-DEV-JSON-OUTPUT.md requires JSON output to include for each package: name, current, latest, age, vulnerabilities (count, maxSeverity, details), filtered flags, filterReason, recommended version, and summary thresholds. However, src/json-formatter.js and the printOutdated JSON branch produce only {name,current,wanted,latest,age}. No vulnerabilities info, no filtered flags, no recommended, no filterReason. Moreover, exit codes in JSON mode are always 0 (no support for exit code 1 when updates exist), and JSON error output (with an error field) is not implemented. Although tests for minimal JSON pass, they do not cover the full schema or exit-code behavior defined in the spec.
